mapper.select: SELECT p.pd_num, q.qna_no, q.qna_pnum, q.qna_rstate, q.qna_content, q.qna_name, q.qna_date, q.qna_hide, q.qna_qstate FROM product p JOIN qna q ON p.pd_num = q.qna_pnum WHERE p.pd_num = #{pdNum}
SELECT q.qna_no, q.qna_content, q.qna_qstate, q.qna_rstate, r.qr_no, r.qr_content, r.qr_id, r.qr_date FROM QNA q INNER JOIN QNAREPLY r ON q.qna_no = r.qna_no WHERE q.qna_no = #{qna_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (qna_no, qna_pnum, qna_name, qna_date, qna_content, qna_qstate, qna_hide, qna_rstate) VALUES (QNA_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{qna_pnum}, #{qna_name}, SYSDATE, #{qna_content}, #{qna_qstate}, #{qna_hide}, #{qna_rstate})
mapper.update: update qna set qna_rstate = #{param2} where qna_no = #{param1}
update qna set qna_hide = #{param2} where qna_no = #{param1}
